explains: n. 法院；（美）县政府所在地

sentences.en: She then emerged from the courthouse to thank her supporters.
sentences.cn: 于是她从法院大楼出来向支持者们表示感谢。

sentences.en: He arrived at the Palm Beach County courthouse with his mother.
sentences.cn: 他和母亲来到了棕榈滩县法院大楼。

sentences.en: Couldn't we just count up our ballots and bring them to the courthouse?
sentences.cn: 我们不能就数好我们的选票然后把它们送到法院吗？
